Enhance your browser experience with KeyGlow, the ultimate extension that brings vibrant visual animations to your every keystroke. Whether youâ€™re searching on Google, commenting on YouTube, chatting on Twitch, tweeting on X.com, or emailing on Gmail, KeyGlow makes every interaction more dynamic and engaging. Plus, now you can upload your own images to customize the animations even further!

Whatâ€™s Inside KeyGlow:
Particle Explosions: Add a burst of colorful particles with every keystroke.
Playful Icon Effects: Enjoy fun and animated icons as you type, giving your text a creative twist.
Unique Image Animations: Personalize your typing experience by uploading your own images to appear in stunning animations.

Supported Websites:
Google: Add visual effects to your searches and browsing.
YouTube: Make your comments and searches come alive with animations.
Twitch: Bring your chat interactions to life with captivating effects.
X.com: Transform your tweets and DMs with eye-catching visuals.

Customize Your Experience:
Upload Your Own Images: KeyGlow now lets you upload your favorite images to create custom animations. Turn any image into a lively effect that appears as you type, making your browsing truly unique.

Personalize Animations: Adjust the size, speed, and intensity of animations to fit your style. Whether you prefer subtle effects or a full-on explosion of color, KeyGlow can do it all.

Privacy and Security:
Your privacy is important to us. KeyGlow operates entirely on your device, ensuring that your data remains private. We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information.

How to Get Started:
Download KeyGlow from the Chrome Web Store.
Customize your settings and upload your favorite images.
Enjoy a more engaging and personalized typing experience on Google, YouTube, Twitch, X.com, and Gmail.

Create and Manage Your Animations:
Upload Custom Images: Use the upload feature to add your own images and create a personalized set of animations.
